description:
Description :
        From ?Fantasy Fighter? Side story to the previous volume featuring Kirishima Kaoru as the representative of the Fujido Groups and Daigo. It follows up on the relationship between Chiharu and Kazuki. The series goes like this: 1. Happy Yarou Wedding 2. Utsukushiki Kemonotachi. 3. ...Virgin Love. 4. Toriko ni Natta Kemono 5. Junai no Seinen 6. Kemono wa Ai de, Iyasareru. 7. Playboy Amour 8. Oboreru Kemono no Koibito. 9. Men's Love - Aikata - Ueta Aikata 10. Amaeta Kemono no Shitsukekata
